attributes.action: Address immigration and the effect on environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Is it not clear to see that our population and way of life is being threatened by mass immigration to the UK? Has anyone in government come to the obvious conclusion that the more we let people enter our country, the more we need to build houses thus threaten the environment by taking up further green belt land! Why don't we stop this nonsense about some made up word called "racist" and help these people in their own country rather than let them come here and drag us down to their level.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
